snippet: The chief pharmacist at the company linked to a deadly meningitis outbreak has received a subpoena to appear before the House Energy and Commerce Committee.
abstract: Barry J Cadden, chief pharmacist at New England Compounding Center, Framingham, Mass, receives subpoena to appear before House Energy and Commerce Committee; company is linked to deadly meningitis outbreak.
lead_paragraph: The chief pharmacist at the company linked to a deadly meningitis outbreak has received a subpoena to appear before the House Energy and Commerce Committee.

headline.main: Massachusetts: House Panel Issues Subpoena in Meningitis Outbreak
headline.print_headline: Massachusetts: House Panel Issues Subpoena In Meningitis Outbreak

keywords.value: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
